problem_names: lemma mem_ass_forms[simp]: "a |\<in>| ass_forms \<longleftrightarrow> a \<in> set assumptions"
lemma mem_conc_forms[simp]: "a |\<in>| conc_forms \<longleftrightarrow> a \<in> set conclusions"

lemma subst_freshen_assumptions[simp]:
    assumes "pf \<in> set assumptions"
    shows "subst s (freshen a pf) = pf "

lemma subst_freshen_conclusions[simp]:
    assumes "pf \<in> set conclusions"
    shows "subst s (freshen a pf) = pf "

lemma subst_freshen_in_ass_formsI:
    assumes "pf \<in> set assumptions"
    shows "subst s (freshen a pf) |\<in>| ass_forms"

lemma subst_freshen_in_conc_formsI:
    assumes "pf \<in> set conclusions"
    shows "subst s (freshen a pf) |\<in>| conc_forms"
translations: lemma mem_ass_forms[simp]: "a |\<in>| ass_forms \<longleftrightarrow> a \<in> set assumptions"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (a |\<in>| ass_forms) = (a \<in> set assumptions)
by (auto simp add: ass_forms_def)
lemma mem_conc_forms[simp]: "a |\<in>| conc_forms \<longleftrightarrow> a \<in> set conclusions"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (a |\<in>| conc_forms) = (a \<in> set conclusions)
by (auto simp add: conc_forms_def)

lemma subst_freshen_assumptions[simp]:
    assumes "pf \<in> set assumptions"
    shows "subst s (freshen a pf) = pf "

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. subst s (freshen a pf) = pf
using assms assumptions_closed

proof (prove)
using this:
  pf \<in> set assumptions
  ?a \<in> set assumptions \<Longrightarrow> closed ?a

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. subst s (freshen a pf) = pf
by (simp add: closed_no_lconsts freshen_def rename_closed subst_closed)

lemma subst_freshen_conclusions[simp]:
    assumes "pf \<in> set conclusions"
    shows "subst s (freshen a pf) = pf "

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. subst s (freshen a pf) = pf
using assms conclusions_closed

proof (prove)
using this:
  pf \<in> set conclusions
  ?c \<in> set conclusions \<Longrightarrow> closed ?c

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. subst s (freshen a pf) = pf
by (simp add: closed_no_lconsts freshen_def rename_closed subst_closed)

lemma subst_freshen_in_ass_formsI:
    assumes "pf \<in> set assumptions"
    shows "subst s (freshen a pf) |\<in>| ass_forms"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. subst s (freshen a pf) |\<in>| ass_forms
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  pf \<in> set assumptions

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. subst s (freshen a pf) |\<in>| ass_forms
by simp

lemma subst_freshen_in_conc_formsI:
    assumes "pf \<in> set conclusions"
    shows "subst s (freshen a pf) |\<in>| conc_forms"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. subst s (freshen a pf) |\<in>| conc_forms
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  pf \<in> set conclusions

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. subst s (freshen a pf) |\<in>| conc_forms
by simp
end
end
